short_description: This Function scores data using a model in Vantage using a DataRobot model
long_description: This function is used to score data in Vantage with a model that has been created outside Vantage and exported to vantage using DataRobot format

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The input table that contains the data to be scored
input_tables.description: The input table that contains the data to be scored

input_tables.name: ModelTable
input_tables.rDescription: The model table to be used for scoring
input_tables.description: The model table to be used for scoring

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of input_table columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the names of the input columns to copy to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: ModelOutputFields
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the columns of the json output that the user wants to specify as individual columns instead of the entire json_report
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the columns of the json output that the user wants to specify as individual columns instead of the entire json_report

argument_clauses.name: OverwriteCachedModel
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the model name that needs to be removed from the cache. * can also be used to remove the models
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the model name that needs to be removed from the cache. * can also be used to remove the models

argument_clauses.name: IsDebug
argument_clauses.rDescription: Print additional information in trace table regarding execution of DataRobotPredict
argument_clauses.description: Print additional information in trace table regarding execution of DataRobotPredict
